altername_name: Adventure No. 10: Savage Island: Part I
name: Savage Island
overview: Number 10 in the Scott Adams adventures, Savage Island is the only multi-part game in the series. At the completion of this game, players receive a password which allows part two to be played. The player begins trapped on a small remote island in the ocean, which is facing a hurricane and also has an active volcano. The player can cross a river, and will also need to explore a cave network. Items are often found by running through the sand with one's hands. The island holds a great secret, which will not be discovered until both parts of the game have been completed.
